### Probe RNAsaP

```{r, echo = F, warning=F}

if(is.na(mea_plote[["RP"]])){
  print("there is no plot")
}else{
  #print("there is a plot to print")
  p <- mea_plote[["RP"]] + 
    theme(legend.position = "none") +
    ggtitle("probe RP")
  plot(p)
}

```
